name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SEEYOU - the Smart Recorder & Virtual Library

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SEEYOU - the personal smart recorder & AI multimedia library for all your events. Now loved by users in more than 100 countries.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
My AI Memory™ by SEEYOU

You forget 90% of all new information within a week.  My AI Memory by SEEYOU gives you instant perfect memory of any on- or offline meeting, lecture, or live session you have ever attended.

A one-stop-shop for booking, attending, and smart-storing meetings across all providers.

Transforming the content of meetings, lectures, streams & gaming into a Personal AI library.

Click on your notes, and the reference video or sound opens where you made the note.

The first-of-their-kind SEEYOU Virtual Cam functions Selfie Loop™ & Real-Time Rewind™ on Mac & Windows

You can instantly access your AI Memory from any platform. Mac, Windows, Android, iOS & Web.

Developed by experts, including two founders with PhDs in psychology & former associate professors in hybrid work.

A deeply researched and meticulous blend of features designed to simplify your hybrid life and achieve the impossible.

The first 250,000 users get free transcripts and summaries when we launch SEEYOU GPT in the fall.
